General.Name: Wallbridge Mining Company Limited
General.Description: Wallbridge Mining Company Limited engages in the acquisition, exploration, discovery, development, and production of gold properties. The company also explores for copper and nickel deposits, as well as platinum group metals. Its flagship property is the Fenelon gold property located in Northern Abitibi, Quebec, Canada. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Lively, Canada.
General.Address: 129 Fielding Road, Lively, ON, Canada, P3Y 1L7
